title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 2102.3 - Audits of schools
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 2102.3 - Audits of schools

State Regulations

Auditors shall be given access to all records relative to
educational loans and the status of students who have educational loans or who
have applied for educational loans (or on whose behalf a parent has taken out
or applied for an educational loan for the student to attend the school), including the following records and such other similar records as are
pertinent: (a) loan
applications; (b) college
transcripts; (c) admissions
application; (d) admissions
acceptance letters; (e) evidence of
high school diploma or equivalent; (f) needs analysis documents; (g) financial aid award letters; and
(h) ledgers or billing
documents. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8
ยง
2102.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
